scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node build.js
scripts.build:beta: cross-env NODE_ENV=beta VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node build.js
scripts.build:close: cross-env NODE_ENV=closebeta VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node build.js
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node build.js
scripts.purge:beta: cross-env NODE_ENV=beta VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node purge.js
scripts.purge:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node purge.js
scripts.purge:close: cross-env NODE_ENV=closebeta VERSION="$npm_package_version" NAME="$npm_package_name" node purge.js
